definitions.definition: A transport system using rails used to move passengers or goods .
A track , consisting of parallel rails , over which wheeled vehicles such as trains may travel.
definitions.label_groups: chiefly UK , Ireland , Philippines and Commonwealth

main_definition: ( chiefly UK , Ireland and Commonwealth ) A transport system using rails used to move passengers or goods .
secondary_definitions: ( chiefly UK , Ireland , Philippines and Commonwealth ) A track , consisting of parallel rails , over which wheeled vehicles such as trains may travel.
